commandAbilities.name: At the Double
commandAbilities.description: You can use this command ability after you declare that a friendly unit will run. That unit must receive the command. The run roll is not made for that unit. Instead, 6" is added to that unitâ€™s Move characteristic in that phase. The unit is still considered to have run.
commandAbilities.flavor: Eager for battle, the warriors pick up their pace and surge towards the enemy.

commandAbilities.name: Redeploy
commandAbilities.description: You can use this command ability in the enemy movement phase after an enemy unit finishes a normal move, run or retreat. The unit that receives the command must be within 9" of that enemy unit and more than 3" from all enemy units. You can make a D6" move with the unit that receives the command, but it must finish the move more than 3" from all enemy units and cannot shoot later in the turn.
commandAbilities.flavor: As the enemy draw close, battle-hardened warriors adjust their position to leave their foe at a disadvantage.
